Why UK Locksmiths Use Us

You don't want to:

  • Learn SEO, ads, and CRM software from scratch
  • Spend evenings posting before-and-after photos
  • Sit by the phone all day just in case it rings

So we:

  • Make you look like the safest choice in your area
  • Answer and log enquiries when you're busy working
  • Give you a simple pipeline to track every job

You pick the plan that matches where you are now. There is always an obvious next step.

Frequently asked questions

What happens when someone finds my listing?

When a customer finds your listing, they can call you directly using the phone number you provide. You'll receive enquiries in real-time, allowing you to respond quickly and win more jobs.

Can I cancel anytime?

Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees. Your listing will remain active until the end of your billing period.

Do I need to verify my business?

Yes, all listings require identity verification (phone OTP and postcode check) before they can be published. This helps maintain trust and keeps scammers off the platform.

What's the difference between the plans?

Each plan offers different levels of visibility and features. Verified gets you listed, Featured puts you above organic results, Never Miss a Job ensures you capture enquiries even when busy, and Own the Area gives you exclusive territory dominance.

Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?

Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, while downgrades will apply at the start of your next billing cycle.
